priceIncreaseMessage.MSRP: Important Notice: As of December 1, 2021, we are increasing the price of the Platinum Plan by $1.67 per month plus taxes, the Music & Entertainment Plan by $1.57 per month plus taxes, the Music Showcase Plan by $0.27 per month plus taxes and the Choose & Save Plan by $0.17 plus taxes. For more information, please visit siriusxm.ca/2021planrates.

priceIncreaseMessage.MRD_MRF_AA_MM: Important Notice: Effective January 8, 2020, we are increasing the rate of the Music Royalty and Administrative Fee from 14.2% to 17.9%. This change will be effective on your first renewal on or following January 8. For more information, please visit siriusxm.ca/2020rates. Promotional plans purchased before January 8th, 2020, will not be subject to a rate or fee increase until the promotional period ends, at which point the applicable increase(s) will apply to the regular monthly rate.
